II fldgi – wêlrK
msgqj
mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha ±kaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha ±kaùï ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK ±kaùï ... 730
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla  NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu  i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk ±kaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m< lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd
Èkhka iy fõ,djka ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd ish¨ u oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod
Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy
fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a ld, fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d
iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla
meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s .eiÜ m;%h m< jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq
fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr tkï" 2013 wfm%a,a ui 26 jeks
Èk m< flfrk .eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2013 wfm%a,a ui 12 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha

Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h
fuu .eiÜ m;%h  www. documents.gov. lk fjí wvúfhka  nd.; l< yel'
ie' hq' —  2013'03'28 Èk m< jQ wxl 1"804 ork .eiÜ m;%fha  II fldgi m< fkdùh'
ie' hq'-   (i)  Y%S ,xld ysrd moku ^ixia:d.; lsÍfï& mk;a flgqïm;" 2012 foieïn¾ ui 28 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§
ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m<lrk ,§'
(ii) mS' yeßika m%cd ixj¾Ok moku ^ixia:d.; lsÍfï& mk;a flgqïm;" 2013 fmnrjdß ui 08 jeks Èk  Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl
iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m<lrk ,§'
(iii)  Y%S ,xld tlai;a l%sia;shdks ifydaor;ajh ^ixia:d.; lsÍfï& mk;a flgqïm;" 2012 fmnrjdß ui 15 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl
iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m<lrk ,§'

lïlre úksYaph iNdj 03 - uykqjr
fuu úksYaph iNdfõ mjrk ,ÿj 1999 j¾Ih jk úg ksfhda. § wjika lrk ,o my; Wmf,aLkfha i|yka kvq jd¾;d 2013'07'12 Èfkka
miqj fuu úksYaph iNd N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lsÍug iQodkï lr we;'
fuu kvq iïnkaOfhka hï md¾Yjlrefjl=g ;udg wjYH kvq f.dkqjl msgm;la fyda hï fldgil msgm;la ,nd .ekSug
wjYH kï ta i|yd b,a¨ïm;% 2013'06'28 Èkg fmr fuu úksYaph iNdfõ iyldr f,alï fj; bÈßm;a l< hq;= h'
tfia b,a,Sula fkdjqkfyd;a my; Wmf,aLkfha i|yka kvq jd¾;d 2013'07'12 Èfkka miqj fuu úksYaph iNd N+ñfha § mq¿iaid

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2013'04'05 733
weô,smsáh ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh
wjika jQ kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
weô,smsáh ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha mjrk ,ÿj" wjika lrk ,o j¾I mylg jvd merKs my; i|yka kvq jd¾;d 2013'07'26 jeks Èfkka
miq wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lsÍug iQodkï lr we;'
02' fuu kvqj,g wod< hï md¾Yjlrefjl=g ;udg wjYH kvqfõ fyda kvqj, iïmQ¾K iy;sl msgm;la fyda hï fldgila fyda
kvqjg f.dkq lr we;s ,shú,a,la ,nd .ekSug wjYH kï ta  ms<sn| b,a,Sula 2013'07'26  Èkg m%:ufhka weô,smsáh ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha
frðiag%d¾;=ñh fj; bÈßm;a l< hq;= h'
03' tfia b,a,Sula fkdjqjfyd;a my; Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s ish¨u kvq jd¾;d 2013'07'26 Èfkka miqj wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid
úkdY lrk nj fuhska okajkq ,efí'
wd¾' tia' ðkodi"
ufyia;%d;a - weô,smsáh'
2013 ud¾;= ui 08 jeks Èk"

ta ta .eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd ±kaùï Ndr .kakd wka;su Èkh iy fõ,djka  my; m< lr we;s Wmf,aLkfha ±lafõ'
